prompts.createTask: Pause your roleplay. Please generate a numbered list of plain text tasks to complete an objective. The objective that you must make a numbered task list for is: "{{objective}}". The tasks created should take into account the character traits of {{char}}. These tasks may or may not involve {{user}} directly. Include the objective as the final task.
prompts.checkTaskCompleted: Pause your roleplay. Determine if this task is completed: [{{task}}]. To do this, examine the most recent messages. Your response must only contain either true or false, and nothing else. Example output: true
prompts.currentTask: Your current task is [{{task}}]. Balance existing roleplay with completing this task.

name: Melissa Gale
mes:
Here is some background about Stefan, Suzanne, and Melissa:

Stefan and Suzanne are both in their early forties and both natives of Munich, Germany. They got married in April of 2016, eight years ago. Together, they have two daughters. The oldest is seven years old. The other is five years old.

Melissa is a woman that met Stefan and Suzanne four months ago when she traveled to Munich with her soon-to-be-ex-husband, Edward. Edward is Stefan's cousin. There was strong connection between Melissa and Stefan, although they did not act on it, and maintain respectful boundaries.

name: Melissa Gale
mes:
I have provided you with a horary chart that I have drawn up specifically asking: Will Stefan confess that he has romantic feelings for me, if so, when?

Stefan should be represented by the 9th house (foreign connection) and Me by the Ascendant.

I've provided a cross reference guide to help identify the houses concerning him due to his 9th house representation.

Please start by listing all relevant chart data for interpretation (ie. transits, aspects, patterns, etc.) from the horary chart using horary principles only. Then I will document them for the actual interpretations.

Remember to follow your directives and maintain accuracy to what is shown in the chart data. Think step by step taking a methodical approach.

name: Madame Esmeralda Blackwood
mes:
Below is a structured list of the horary chart data using horary principles for the query “Will Stefan confess that he has romantic feelings for me, and if so, when?” (Melissa represented by the Ascendant; Stefan represented by the 9th house as per your guidelines):

1. Planetary Positions
 • Sun: 10° 31′ Pisces
 • Moon: 22° 13′ Pisces
 • Mercury: 26° 5′ Pisces
 • Venus: 10° 48′ Aries
 • Mars: 17° 9′ Cancer
 • Jupiter: 12° 15′ Gemini
 • Saturn: 20° 40′ Pisces
 • Uranus: 23° 37′ Taurus
 • Neptune: 28° 53′ Pisces
 • Pluto: 2° 53′ Aquarius
 • North Node: 28° 22′ Pisces (retrograde)
 • Chiron: 20° 36′ Aries

2. House Cusps (using provided structure for Melissa’s chart)
 • Ascendant (1st House – represents you, Melissa): 16° Leo
 • 2nd House: starts at 9° Virgo
 • 3rd House: starts at 3° Libra
 • 4th House: starts at 6° Scorpio
 • 5th House: starts at 16° Sagittarius
 • 6th House: starts at 21° Capricorn (contains Pluto)
 • 7th House: starts at 16° Aquarius
 • 8th House: starts at 9° Pisces – contains Sun, Moon, Mercury, Saturn, Neptune and North Node
 • 9th House (represents Stefan per your assignment; note also contains Venus and Chiron): starts at 3° Aries
 • 10th House: starts at 6° Taurus – contains Jupiter and Uranus
 • 11th House: starts at 16° Gemini – contains Mars
 • 12th House: starts at 21° Cancer

3. Major Aspects (with orbs as provided – these aspects connect the energies relevant to your query)
 • Neptune Conjunct North Node (orb: 0°)
 • Moon Sextile Uranus (orb: 1°)
 • Venus Sextile Jupiter (orb: 2°)
 • Sun Square Jupiter (orb: 2°)
 • Mercury Conjunct North Node (orb: 2°)
 • Mercury Conjunct Neptune (orb: 2°)
 • Moon Conjunct Saturn (orb: 2°)
 • Saturn Sextile Uranus (orb: 3°)
 • Mercury Sextile Uranus (orb: 3°)
 • Mars Square Chiron (orb: 3°)
 • Mars Trine Saturn (orb: 3°)
 • Pluto Sextile North Node (orb: 4°)
 • Jupiter Sextile Ascendant (orb: 4°)
 • Sun Sextile Midheaven (MC) (orb: 4°)
 • Pluto Square IC (orb: 4°)
 • Pluto Square MC (orb: 4°)
 • Moon Conjunct Mercury (orb: 4°)
 • Chiron Trine Ascendant (orb: 4°)
 • Sun Trine IC (orb: 4°)
 • Uranus Sextile Neptune (orb: 5°)
 • Moon Trine Mars (orb: 5°)
 • Mars Sextile Uranus (orb: 6°)
 • Mercury Sextile Pluto (orb: 6°)
 • Mercury Conjunct Saturn (orb: 6°)
 • Moon Conjunct Neptune (orb: 6°)
 • Venus Trine Ascendant (orb: 6°)
 • Uranus Square Ascendant (orb: 7°)
 • Venus Square Mars (orb: 7°)
 • Sun Trine Mars (orb: 7°)

4. Patterns and Special Features
 • Stellium: The chart features a stellium in Pisces; specifically Neptune, North Node, Mercury, Saturn, and the Moon are grouped there, concentrated in the 8th House.
 • T-Square: Formed by the MC in Taurus (6° Taurus), Pluto in Aquarius (2° Aquarius), and the IC in Scorpio (6° Scorpio). This pattern indicates tension between personal, public, and foundational matters.
 • Additional Notables:
  – The Moon is in its waxing crescent phase.
  – The chart exhibits a ‘Bowl’ shape.
  – Dominant element among inner planets: Water
  – Dominant mode among inner planets: Mutable
  – Most planets are concentrated in the top right quadrant.
  – The IC is on the Nadir.
  – Sextile is the most frequent aspect (10 instances).
  – The Moon is involved in 9 aspects.
  – Neptune in Pisces acts as the sole dispositor for the stellium.

5. House Cross-Reference for Stefan (as provided)
 – Ascendant’s 6th House corresponds to Stefan’s 9th House.
 – Additional mapping (from your guide) shows that:
  • Ascendant’s 9th House corresponds to Stefan’s 12th House.
  • (Follow the mapping as detailed in your cross-reference guide.)

The above details compile all the relevant chart data—including planetary placements, houses, aspects, patterns, and special features—for your horary query using a methodical, data-based approach.

name: Melissa Gale
mes: Thank you, Madame. Please, proceed to interpretation.

name: Madame Esmeralda Blackwood
mes:
Analyzing the horary chart for your query yields the following interpretation:

1. Your chart is dominated by a heavy Pisces influence in the 8th house, which indicates deep emotional currents and transformative issues at play. The stellium here (Moon, Mercury, Neptune, Saturn, and the North Node) emphasizes that hidden or subconscious matters are active. Mercury—ruling communication—conjunct both Neptune and the North Node, calls for revelations emerging from the depths. Its influence signals that messages or confessions may arise once these energies align.

2. Stefan’s representative, placed in the 9th house (with Venus and Chiron in Aries), projects an impulsive and direct quality in romantic matters. Venus in Aries suggests that his feelings, though sudden and fiery, carry underlying wounds or hesitations (echoed by Chiron). The sextile connection between Venus and Jupiter reinforces that his emotional expression is supported by a beneficent, if not fated, impulse.

3. The Moon in your chart (querent) is in a waxing crescent phase, suggesting an initiating energy. Its aspects—sextile to Uranus and trine to Mars—imply that unexpected developments and a drive to act are at work. This Moon, representing the flow of events, currently resides in the 8th house but will eventually move toward the 9th, symbolically crossing into the area that governs Stefan’s influence.

4. The T-square formed by the MC in Taurus, Pluto in Aquarius, and the IC in Scorpio introduces tension among personal foundation, public direction, and deep emotional undercurrents. This configuration intimates that while the energy for a confession is building, internal conflicts and external pressures might delay a straightforward expression.

5. Timing indications appear when considering the Moon’s journey and Mercury’s significant role. The Moon’s waxing movement—coupled with Mercury’s reconciling influence over transformative degrees—points toward a period in which communication is cleared to allow Stefan’s feelings to surface. In horary practice, such transit-based indications often point to a relatively near-term event. The chart’s configuration suggests that once the Moon migrates from its current sector into the region influenced by the 9th house cusp (around early Aries), the conditions for his confession gain strength.

Based on these elements, it appears that Stefan is on the cusp of acknowledging his feelings. The energies suggest a forthcoming moment, likely within a period measured by the lunar transit in conjunction with Mercury’s decisive aspects. With the benefic influence of Jupiter supporting Venus and the destiny-indicating conjunctions of Mercury, the reading indicates that his confession is likely to unfold after overcoming some internal conflict. Expect the critical energies to align around the time when the Moon transitions into the early degrees of Aries, which by astrological timing could correspond approximately to a fortnight from the present moment.

The chart clearly emphasizes that while the confession is not immediate, the cosmic energies are positioning for an eventual revelation of his romantic feelings toward you.
